Peacefully tucked away within a private complex that contains its own street name, this single-level delight is sure to excite those seeking low maintenance living that is big on community and convenience.
Set beyond manicured front gardens, it features a light, airy and well-presented interior; enhanced with contemporary flooring, neutral paint tones and lashings of natural sunlight.

It is also a short drive to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Croydon Main Street and Train Station, Eastland and the EastLink freeway.

Description:
Charismatic Rarity in the Heart of Wonga Park
Welcome to wonderful Wonga Park, where the air is clean, the scenery is green and a quaint village vibe is ever present. Embracing a heart of town position, we present the exciting proposition to secure this mid-1970's charmer, available for the first time in 50 years. Set on a quiet, sealed lane, on a flat 1/3 acre approx. block, it oozes eclectic appeal, with outstanding architecture and quality that has stood the test of time.
Now ready for a new family to move in and make it their own, it showcases a sprawling well-zoned floorplan where children and parents can live harmoniously in their own separate wings.
Designed around a private courtyard with solar heated swimming pool, the front half of the home features a family room, intimate lounge with bluestone fireplace and concealed wet bar/coffee station plus a connecting master suite with walk-in wardrobe and updated en suite. A central galley kitchen with meals area flaunts a country-chic aesthetic and includes quality appliances, a provincial sink, timber benchtops plus an abundance of white cabinetry. Two robed bedrooms plus a study/additional bedroom with built-in desk are located off a rear corridor, accompanied by a contemporary bathroom and large sun/rumpus room. Spilling out to the backyard from here, a paved circular sitting area overlooks the property's well-established gardens, which attract a variety of native birdlife.
Enriched with all of the creature comforts, it include: gas hydronic wall heating, air conditioning, an alarm system, generous amounts of storage plus a remote double garage that has plenty of rear space to enlarge.
Enjoying all the benefits of its green wedge position, it reaches buses, Wonga Park General Store and Post Office on foot. Only minutes from Wonga Park and Yarra Road Primary Schools, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, IGA, local eateries, renowned golf courses and wineries.
* Mid-1970's character-style home in the heart of Wonga Park
* Three living zones complemented by a private courtyard with solar heated swimming pool
* Country-chic kitchen with meals area
* Three robed bedrooms, study/fourth bedroom and two updated bathrooms
* Gas hydronic wall heating, air conditioning and an alarm system
* Well established gardens that invite a variety of birdlife
* Remote double garage that has plenty of rear space to enlarge
* Walking distance to buses, Wonga Park General Store and Post Office. A short drive to schools, shops, golf courses and wineries
